title: SignatureVerificationStrategy (/sdks/wayfinder/wayfinder-core/(verification-strategies)/signatureverificationstrategy)
content: Verifies signatures of Arweave transactions and data items. Headers are retrieved from trusted gateways for use during verification. For a transaction, its data root is computed while streaming its data and then utilized alongside its headers for verification. For data items, the ANS-104 deep hash method of signature verification is used.
